title: FIFA Gate Data Viz
subtitle: Visualization showcasing global corruption schemes via money flows between FIFA officials and co-conspirators.
detail: Icons represent each "Actor" involved, Colors denote Connection types, and Line types define Actual vs Planned payoffs. Featured on USA Today's Fields of Green. Collaborative project with Rook Campbell, PhD.

media.embed: <iframe src='http://mihaipet.eu/media/projects/visualization-fifagate' width='100%' height='700' frameborder='0' allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Tracking Live Music Venues
subtitle: Los Angeles live music venue density map.
detail: A visualization of 210 live music events taking place at 87 different venues across Los Angeles, over the course of a week. Data scraped from Ticketfly.

media.embed: <iframe src='https://jericho1ne.carto.com/viz/e2d9efda-4c42-11e3-b6c4-a779afcc8bc7/embed_map' width='100%' height='520' frameborder='0' allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Middle of June
subtitle: A live music aggregator with which searches for detailed artist info and video clips on the fly.

title: Law Offices of Gail Dulay
subtitle: Responsive framework website with a heavy SEO focus, relying heavily on custom-built HTML templates.

title: Renova Bikes
subtitle: Responsive small business website with a dynamically-driven bicycle inventory.
detail: Users are able to search the inventory for the right-sized bike. Inventory is updated via a Google Spreadsheet.

title: Waterbowl
subtitle: A social network for dog lovers (iOS mobile app).

title: Find Some Coffee
subtitle: Geolocative web app for finding nearby coffee shops with strong coffee and equally strong wifi.

title: Mapping Oahu Traffic Incidents
subtitle: Tracking traffic incidents on Oahu over a two week period.
detail: Created with CartoDB using a publicly available dataset.
